column5: The wife and I are heading to the Shiningtree area for a week or so fishing and partridge hunting does anyone know what the bird #s are like this year. Thanks Mike

I live around Kipawa, and I've seen more partridge this year then i ever have in this area and everyone else is saying the exact same thing.  Not exactly where you will be, but I'm betting you'll see plenty of birds.  Good luck
That's good to hear Joe, We hunted up that way a couple of years ago around Cedar pine Rd. and We did not do well t all so that's encouraging news. Thanks Mike
Brookies and Grouse. September 15th. One of my favourite days of the year.
Lots of birds on my property too. Near North Bay. Seems like a good year
You shouldn't have said that Chad.  See you in a few hours!!!
Hey Mikdor - I'm at 3 bears camp (Shining Tree) for a week beginning Sept 14 - when are you going?
See you in...couple weeks??? Season opens soon!
Hey wormdunker We are heading up on the 12th,To do some scouting and fishing. Are U staying in a cabin or an rv. We will be staying in our 24ft Citation trailer.
